record.title: MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR
record.narrative:
MEASURE PLACED ON THE CALENDAR -- (Senate - October 04, 2007)

[Page: S12695]

speaking.paragraph: I understand that H.R. 2828 is at the desk and due for a second reading.

record.chair: The Senator is correct. The clerk will read the bill by title for the second time.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:
A bill (H.R. 2828) to provide compensation to relatives of United States citizens who were killed as a result of the bombings of United States Embassies in East Africa on August 7, 1998.

speaking.paragraph: I now object to any further proceedings at this time.

record.chair: Objection is heard. The bill will be placed on the calendar.
